segments.text: Is Stanley still singing that Elvis song ? He's really hogging the mike !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I hear " Love Me Tender " one more time , I think I'm going to go crazy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He sounds like a sick cow !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we adjust the pitch a little ? Maybe he'll sound better in a higher key .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I already tried that . Nothing seems to help .
segments.speaker: S1
